### Norovirus

```{r}

```

### Clostridium

```{r}
cdiff <- sum(positives$pathogen == "Clostridium difficile toxin A/B")
valueBox(cdiff, icon = "fa-trash",
         color = ifelse(cdiff > 5, "warning", "primary"))
```
